TopicTitle: Scroll issue with both the part list and the camera scrolling at the same time.

Articles.Content:
As the title states, the camera keeps scrolling up and down whenever I scroll in the parts list.

I have updated to the latest KSP 1.2.1 and all my mods have been updated to their latest versions in CKAN.

where is your muse pointing at and what do u use to scroll?
KSP.log or at least some informations about ur system (OS?)

Edited November 3, 2016 by Speadge

6 hours ago, Speadge said:

where is your muse pointing at and what do u use to scroll?
KSP.log or at least some informations about ur system (OS?)

I hover with my mouse over the extended part list and then scroll with my mouse wheel.

A temporary solution I now have is by disabling the mouse scroll in using the WASD Editor Camera Continued mod which disables the camera from moving but the scrolling in the parts is working fine. This does mean I use use Q and E to go up and down with the camera.

I also notiched in general that I seem to be able to click through ui elements in VAB.
